title: Bitstream Font Equivalencies List
content:
My employer has a site license for the Bitstream Type Odyssey Mac CD, and I wanted to compare some of the fonts to the Adobe/ITC/Linotype/MT versions I am more familiar with, since the numerical names from Bitstream aren't always that helpful... I found some matches from a forum search, others from myfonts, and yet others from google, and thought someone else might find such a list useful. Some of the Bitstream fonts below appear to be clones of the more familiar versions; others are only loosely based on the matched font. The usual accuracy disclaimer applies, I may have made some search mistakes, YMMV, etc....

Aldine 401 = Bembo  
Aldine 430 = Stempel Garamond  
Aldine 721 = News Plantin  
Drescher Grotesk = Avenir  
Dutch 766 = Adobe Caslon  
Dutch 801 = Times New Roman  
Dutch 809 = Concorde  
Dutch 811 = Olympian  
Dutch 823 = Aster  
Engravers Gothic = Copperplate  
Engravers Old Style = Cochin  
Garamond (American) = Garamond #3  
Garamond (Classical) = Sabon  
Garamond (Elegant) = Granjon  
Garamond (Italian) = Simoncini Garamond  
Garamond (Original) = Stempel Garamond  
Geometric 231 = Kabel  
Geometric 415 = Metro  
Geometric 706 = Neuzeit Grotesk  
Geometric Slab Serif 703 = Memphis  
Geometric Slab Serif 712 = Rockwell  
Gothic 720 = MT Grotesque  
Gothic 725 = Akzidenz Grotesk  
Humanist 521 = Gill Sans  
Humanist 531 = Syntax  
Humanist 777 = Frutiger

author: ryanholmes

comments.content:
Drescher Grotesk is Drescher Grotesk, not Avenir.  
Dutch 766 is Imprint, not Adobe Caslon.
IME the quality is usually better than Adobe.
